name: THE RECTANGULAR PLANET
description:
Hey there awesome people , 

This is a 2D puzzle game where you have think from 2 point of view.

You can rotate the whole system  ["PLANET"] and can play as 2D Space Shooter and then back rotate to view as a Platformer  and can jump move and more.

You may face difficulties in some level and if that happens plz let me know in the comment section.

All the assets are made by me  in Aesprite. Some are inspired from Unity  Official Projects.

Music Score from : http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/onlymeith/61318

And Thanks.

Your experience with this game will be awesome.

IF ANY BUG FOUND PLZ LET ME KNOW.
